title: Poland turns water cannon on rock-throwing migrants at border
content:
1. Poland turns water cannon on rock-throwing migrants at border  Reuters
  2. Water cannons aimed at migrants in tense border standoff  CNN
  3. Poland border crisis: EU to widen Belarus sanctions as row intensifies  BBC News
  4. Migrants who fled Middle East for Belarus now showing up in Germany  CBS News
  5. Poland, Lithuania and Latvia consider triggering NATO's Article 4 over the Belarus border crisis  CNN
